title: Drift History Entry Schema
description: Schema for entries in the drift history JSONL file

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the validation was performed

surface_health_score.description: Overall health score as a percentage (0-100)

drift_issues_detected.description: Number of drift issues detected during validation

validation_source.description: Source of the validation (startup or post-merge)

validation_summary.description: Brief summary of the validation results

agent_health_score.description: Health score for agents as a percentage (0-100)

module_health_score.description: Health score for modules as a percentage (0-100)

schema_health_score.description: Health score for schemas as a percentage (0-100)

endpoint_health_score.description: Health score for endpoints as a percentage (0-100)

component_health_score.description: Health score for components as a percentage (0-100)

memory_tag.description: Memory tag created for this validation run
